title:
Multivector (MV) functions in Clifford algebras of arbitrary dimension:
  Defective MV case
abstract:
Explicit formulas to calculate MV functions in a basis-free representation
are presented for an arbitrary Clifford geometric algebra Cl(p,q). The formulas
are based on analysis of the roots of minimal MV polynomial and covers
defective MVs, i.e. the MVs that have non-diagonalizable matrix
representations. The method may be generalized straightforwardly to matrix
functions and to finite dimensional linear operators. The results can find wide
application in Clifford algebra analysis.
